= Pentoo Installation =

Boot Pentoo LiveUSB
<P>Update pentoo-installer:
{{{
layman -s pentoo
emerge -1 pentoo-installer
}}}

Run pentoo-installer<br>
Follow steps in the menu<br>
Don't forget to assign root password and create regular user
<P>Remove live media and reboot from the installed copy

= Updating Pentoo =
Update the installed copy as described in the [PentooUpdater#On_regular_basis Pentoo Updater] section

= Cleaning up live configuration =
{{{
# Remove live-related configuration
rc-update delete fixinittab
rc-update delete tmpfiles.setup boot
rc-update delete modules boot

# Re-generate /etc/inittab file
emerge -1 sys-apps/sysvinit
}}}
